special_abilities.name: Turn Immunity
special_abilities.desc: . The claw is immune to effects that turn undead.

special_abilities.name: Claw
special_abilities.desc: . Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) bludgeoning or slashing damage (claw's choice).

name: Crawling Claw
senses: blindsight 30 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 10
